private.this_msg_is_encrypted: Kua muhumuhua tēnei karere ki tō kupu karapa.
private.only_see_once: Kia tūpato: ka kitea tēnei kotahi anake.
private.created_success: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna!
private.created_success_key: Kua hangaia angitutia te karere huna {shortKey}!
private.created_securely: Kua hangaia haumaru tō karere huna
private.have-more-questions-visit-our: He pātai anō? Toro ki tā mātou
private.the-burn-feature-lets-you-permanently-de: Ko te āhuatanga whakawareware ka tuku i a koe ki te muku pūmau i tētahi karere huna i mua i te tirohanga o tētahi. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā me whakakore te urunga, i tuari rānei i ngā mōhiohio hē. Ina whakawarekia, kāore e taea te whakahoki i te karere huna.
private.your-secret-will-remain-available-for-re: Ka noho wātea tonu tō karere huna mō {0}, tae noa rānei ki te wā ka tirohia, ko tēhea e tae tuatahi ana. Whai muri i te tutuki o tētahi o ngā āhuatanga, ka mukua pūmautia te karere huna.
private.how-does-secret-expiration-work: Me pēhea te mahi o te paunga karere huna?
private.for-security-reasons-we-cant-recover-los: Mō ngā take haumaru, kāore e taea e mātou te whakahoki mai i ngā hononga karere huna ngaro. Me waihanga e koe he karere huna hou, me hanga hoki he hononga hou. Ka tūtohu mātou kia tāruahia te hononga i te wā tonu i muri i te hanganga.
private.lost-your-secret-link: Kua ngaro tō hononga karere huna?
private.we-display-the-value-for-you-so-that-you: Ka whakaatu mātou i te uara ki a koe kia taea ai e koe te whakaū engari ka mahia kotahi tēnā, nō reira ki te whiwhi tētahi i tēnei whārangi tūmataiti (i tō hītori pūtirotiro, mehemea rānei ka tuku matapokorere koe i te hononga tūmataiti kaua ko te hononga karere huna), kāore rātou e kite i te uara karere huna.
private.why-can-i-only-see-the-secret-value-once: He aha ka kitea kotahi noa e au te uara karere huna?
private.burning-a-secret-permanently-deletes-it-: Ko te whakawareware i tētahi karere huna ka muku pūmau i mua i te pānuitanga o tētahi. Ka kite te kaiwhiwhi i tētahi karere e tohu ana kāore te karere huna i te tīari. He mea whai hua tēnei mēnā ka tuari pohewa koe i ngā mōhiohio hē, me ārai rānei te urunga.
private.what-happens-when-i-burn-a-secret: He aha ka puta ina whakawaretia e au tētahi karere huna?
private.and-never-stored-in-its-original-form-th: ā, kāore i te rokiroki i tōna āhua taketake. Ko tēnei huarahi ko tō tikanga kāore e taea e mātou te uru, te whakahoki rānei i tō karere huna - ko te tangata anake me te kupu karapa tika ka taea.
private.each-secret-can-only-be-viewed-once-afte: Ka taea te tiro kotahi noa ia karere huna. Whai muri i te tirohanga, ka mukua pūmautia mai i ā mātou tūmau. Ka whakaū tēnei kāore e kitea pokerehia ō mōhiohio tairongo mā te hītori pūtirotiro, mā ngā hononga tūmataiti hē rānei.

shared.requires_passphrase: Me whai kupu karapa tēnei karere:
shared.viewed_own_secret: Kua tirohia e koe tō ake karere huna. Kāore i te wātea mō tētahi atu.
shared.you_created_this_secret: Nāu i hanga tēnei karere huna. Ki te tirohia e koe, kāore e kite te kaiwhiwhi.
shared.reply_with_secret: Whakautu ki tētahi atu karere huna
shared.pre_reveal_default: Pāwhiri te pātene ki raro hei whakaatu i tō karere haumaru.
shared.post_reveal_default: Kei raro nei tō karere haumaru.
